attr.title: Neon City Riders
attr.desc: Explore a decaying futuristic city in search of items, superpowers and companions to free all the turfs of the evil gangs and unite their people again!
attr.inst: Download the game from Steam and copy all game files into assets folder. The game is not recommended for RK3326 devices due to poor performance in many areas.
attr.inst_md: Download the game from [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1102650/Neon_City_Riders/) and copy all game files into `assets` folder. The game is not recommended for `RK3326` devices due to poor performance in many areas.
